idea-plugin.name: CodeHelp
idea-plugin.description: CodeHelp is an Intellij plugin for helping out any user who often forgets how to use something and end up googling for the same example every time, or just wants to look for how to use something within the ease of their own IDE. The best part about CodeHelp is the fact that any user can contribute code snippets to the CodeHelp database (After being accepted) which everyone can use when they restart their IDE.
